summary: My first Skyrim Mod. Not playable, just preview. An working Potion Rack.
descriptionHtml:
(Not playable, just preview, please check later..)

How to see in the game?
1. Unzip to Skyrim folder
2. Check in loader
3. Print in game console
\"coc prtest\" (without quotes) for teleporting to the test location
\"coc whiterun\" for exit

How create a new mod with potion racks?
1. Add following keywords \"Creation Kit - Miscellanies - Keywords\"
PotionRackContainer
PotionRackClickTrigger
PotionRackPotion01
PotionRackPotion02
PotionRackPotion03
PotionRackPotion04
PotionRackPotion05
PotionRackPotion06
PotionRackPotion07
PotionRackPotion08
PotionRackPotion09
PotionRackPotion10
PotionRackPotion11
PotionRackPotion12
PotionRackPotion13
PotionRackPotion14
PotionRackPotion15
PotionRackPotion16
PotionRackPotion17
PotionRackPotion18
PotionRackTrigger01
PotionRackTrigger02
PotionRackTrigger03
PotionRackTrigger04

2. Unzip scripts from this mod. Use an tutorial video about bookshelves but with Potion racks stuffs, PlayerPotionRackClickTrigger, PlayerPotionRackTrigger, DefaultPotionRackPotionMarker.. etc

3. (!) Click to the Activators/PlayerPotionRackClickTrigger in Object Window, double click to the script and click to Auto-Fill All
Do the same with PlayerPotionRackContainer

Optional: Edit LItemPotionClutter Level item list to control what items will works with this rack.
author: vincentjazz12
